thread.title: U.S. stocks open lower amid earnings, data - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks open lower amid earnings, data - MarketWatch

author: Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks open lower amid earnings, data - MarketWatch
text: U.S. stocks opened slightly lower on Tuesday as investors digested a slew of earnings reports and better-than-expected housing data. The S&P 500 SPX, -0.16% opened 3 points, or 0.1%, lower at 2,030. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -0.26% fell 40 points, or 0.2%, to 17,190. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.12% began the day down 6 points, or 0.1%, at 4,898.
